version_description:
Greetings to all Archery Players!
Celebrate with us the global launch of our new game! Since the early days of beta we’ve introduced a lot of new features and improvements - now we invite all of you to check them out.

Greetings to all Archery Players!
Celebrate with us the global launch of our new game! Since the early days of beta we’ve introduced a lot of new features and improvements - now we invite all of you to check them out.

- Connection issues fix: Players should no longer experience problems joining matches
- In-game currency fix: Players should no longer see their Coins balance unfairly deducted
- Game load times fix: Game crashes during load times should stop happening
- Other minor bug fixes and improvements

Please note that we are constantly working on making Archery Club the best experience for our players. If you have any issues or suggestions do not hesitate to contact us at support@boombit.com.

- Connection issues fix: Players should no longer experience problems joining matches
- In-game currency fix: Players should no longer see their Coins balance unfairly deducted
- Game load times fix: Game crashes during load times should stop happening
- Other minor bug fixes and improvements

Please note that we are constantly working on making Archery Club the best experience for our players. If you have any issues or suggestions do not hesitate to contact us at support@boombit.com.

This update contains visual and gameplay improvements!
- Networking and stability improvements
- Winter layout 
- UI improvements
- Additional Bugfixes

This update contains visual and gameplay improvements!
- Networking and stability improvements
- Winter layout 
- UI improvements
- Additional Bugfixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

In this update you’ll find a lot of great things:
- New shiny Boosters! They will improve your bow parameters and help you win!
- Daily rewards! From now on, every day, you can collect your juicy presents!
- Tons of new gameplay content! New gameplay variants: moving targets, new animals, drones and many more!

In this update you’ll find a lot of great things:
- New shiny Boosters! They will improve your bow parameters and help you win!
- Daily rewards! From now on, every day, you can collect your juicy presents!
- Tons of new gameplay content! New gameplay variants: moving targets, new animals, drones and many more!

The newest Archery Club update is here and is one of the biggest yet! Try out the awesome new content:
- Two new Skill Shots
Try your skill in two new Skill Shot modes for Shortbow and Compoundbow
- Introducing Special Events!
Play three exciting time attack special events: Time Attack (Longbow), Let the hunt begin (Compoundbow), Fly Away

The newest Archery Club update is here and is one of the biggest yet! Try out the awesome new content:
- Two new Skill Shots
Try your skill in two new Skill Shot modes for Shortbow and Compoundbow
- Introducing Special Events!
Play three exciting time attack special events: Time Attack (Longbow), Let the hunt begin (Compoundbow), Fly Away

Introducing Legendary Bows!
- Put your hands on the most beautiful and effective bows in the game! Also, they’re full of special effects! 
New stuff for subscribers!
- Epic golden Hurricane bow, golden nickname, frame and more!
Bug fixes and improvements.

Introducing Legendary Bows!
- Put your hands on the most beautiful and effective bows in the game! Also, they’re full of special effects! 
New stuff for subscribers!
- Epic golden Hurricane bow, golden nickname, frame and more!
Bug fixes and improvements.

This update contains quality improvements:

- Shortbow mode has been improved! Three new special targets have been added to the game. 
   Are you fast enough to shoot them down?
- Bug fixes and improvements

This update contains quality improvements:

- Shortbow mode has been improved! Three new special targets have been added to the game. 
   Are you fast enough to shoot them down?
- Bug fixes and improvements

This latest update is huge!

- Introducing Clubs!!! The feature our players wanted the most is finally here! Join or create a club to chat, collect club points and play friendly battles with club mates.
- Plenty of new fully animated emotes to unlock.
- Unlock your Free Chests every 5 minutes instead of 2h!
- You can now send private messages to other players.
- A lot of bug fixes and quality improvements.

This update contains new features and quality improvements!
• Levelup Road - get awesome rewards like boosters, emotes, frames and many more for leveling up
• Performance fixes and other quality improvements

- Log in to the game every day to become a VIP and get awesome bonuses!
- UI and gameplay optimizations.
- Bug fixes and other improvements.

This update contains new features and quality improvements:

Three new excting Special Events are starting one by one from 27th of June!
 + Fruit Archer
 + Balloons Shooter 
 + Bottles Breaker

Bug fixes and improvements.

This update contains new features and quality improvements mostly based on your feedback:

- Arena #10 added to the game - test your skills on the new Lost Temple Arena!
- Get more gems from Victory Chests - the higher arena you play, the more gems you'll earn!
- No more ads for Subscribers - enjoy completely ads-free experience and get all rewards without watching commercials!
- Shop is easier to navigate thanks to added tabs on the top of the screen
- A lot of bug fixes, optimizations and improvements have been implemented

This update contains new features and quality improvements mostly based on your feedback:

- Arena #10 added to the game - test your skills on the new Lost Temple Arena!
- Get more gems from Victory Chests - the higher arena you play, the more gems you'll earn!
- No more ads for Subscribers - enjoy completely ads-free experience and get all rewards without watching commercials!
- Shop is easier to navigate thanks to added tabs on the top of the screen
- A lot of bug fixes, optimizations and improvements have been implemented

This latest update is huge!
- Introducing Challenges Mode: prove your skill in this exciting single-player mode!
- Daily Rewards have been improved
- A lot of fixes and other quality of life improvements.

This latest update is huge!
- Introducing Challenges Mode: prove your skill in this exciting single-player mode!
- Daily Rewards have been improved
- A lot of fixes and other quality of life improvements.

This update contains new features and quality improvements!
- Halloween theme added to the game
- Enjoy a special Halloween event and win special emotes
- You can now invite friends without using Facebook
- Create your own custom offers
- A lot of fixes and other quality of life improvements

- Create your own custom offers

Winter is coming! This update cointains new features and quality of life improvements:
- Winter and Xmas layout and decorations and emotes
- New arenas and game modes available for Friendly Battles
- Difficulty for level 52 in Single Player decreased
- Other bug fixes and improvements

- Winter and Xmas layout and decorations and emotes
- New arenas and game modes available for Friendly Battles
- Difficulty for level 52 in Single Player decreased
- Other bug fixes and improvements

This update contains new features and quality of life improvements:
- Introducing Seasons: Compete with players all over the world in bi-weekly seasons, become #1 in the ranking and claim awesome rewards from each arena to get bonus trophies! They will be reset every two weeks and competition will start from the beginning
- Bug fixes and other improvements
